about_the_game:
NOIR STORM IS...

a Point & Click adventure game with aesthetics and narrative inspired by Film Noir, real history, and classic adventures of the 90's.

THE PLOT:

You will join Daniel Leone, a private investigator in 1952´s Buenos Aires city. His partner, Martinez, has been missing for several days. When Daniel follows the only lead he has and is almost killed, he will discover that Martinez has been involved in matters far out of his league.

THE SETTING:

With a musical and visual setting typical of the 50s, solve the challenges of a classic adventure game. Gather clues with Leone's notebook and follow the trail to the end of his dangerous adventure.




FEATURES:

  • Classic point & click adventure game inspired by Film Noir.
  • Narrative fueled by real locations, characters, historical investigations, and real warlike elements of the time.
  • Meet deep characters through conversations, collect items, solve puzzles, and combine clues and data in your notebook to advance in the investigation.
  • Pixelart art and animation accompanied by unique comic illustrations.
  • Find out what happened with the Nazis in South America (based on real investigations of the well-known argentinian journalist and writer Abel Basti)
  • Rain, rain everywhere! It's a storm after all...

content_descriptors.notes: Slight violence and occasional nasty dialogue.

short_description: Take on the role of a private detective who, intercepted by a MOSSAD spy on the city of Buenos Aires in 1952, is drawn into a dangerous odyssey against exiles from the Third Reich and the inminent threat of a new and unprecedented weapon of mass destruction.

English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
